Question
========

We take a sample of 7 individuals from a large population and measure their body temperature in degrees Celsius, with the results being 37.6, 37.1, 38.0, 37.5, 36.9, 37.1, 37.3. The median of the sample is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 37.1
* 37.2
* 37.3
* 37.39

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 37.1: Incorrect
* 37.2: Incorrect
* 37.3: Correct
* 37.39: Incorrect
